resources.string: You are registered as a seller. You can add your shop products here for the customers to see. You can also view/edit them any time. Interested customers can contact directly to you.
NOTE : Username once selected cannot be changed

Welcome to the Online Catalogue App. This App lets you put and showcase your Shop inventory online for customers. It is not a platform to buy/purchase Items online, but customer can view the seller details and make contact with the seller.
